title: Vegan Mushroom Risotto
description: A creamy and comforting risotto made with arborio rice, fresh mushrooms, vegetable broth, and a hint of white wine, all topped with fresh herbs.
steps: In a pot, heat the vegetable broth and keep it simmering over low heat.
In a large pan, heat olive oil over medium heat. Add diced onion and sauté until translucent.
Add minced garlic and sliced mushrooms, cooking until mushrooms are golden and tender.
Stir in arborio rice and cook for 2-3 minutes, allowing it to toast slightly.
Pour in the white wine and stir until it's absorbed by the rice.
Gradually add the hot vegetable broth, one ladle at a time, stirring frequently. Wait until the liquid is mostly absorbed before adding more.
Continue this process until the rice is creamy and al dente, about 20-25 minutes.
Season with salt and black pepper to taste. Serve hot, garnished with fresh parsley.
author: AI-generated

title: Vegan Pesto Pasta
description: A delightful pasta dish tossed in a vibrant basil pesto made with nuts, nutritional yeast, and olive oil, served with sun-dried tomatoes and fresh arugula.
ingredients: 12 oz pasta of choice (spaghetti, penne, etc.)
steps: Cook the pasta according to package directions until al dente. Drain and set aside.
In a food processor, combine basil leaves, sunflower seeds, nutritional yeast, garlic, salt, and black pepper. Blend until finely chopped.
With the processor running, gradually add olive oil until the mixture is smooth and creamy.
In a large bowl, combine cooked pasta with the pesto and mix well.
Fold in the sun-dried tomatoes and serve on a bed of fresh arugula.
author: AI-generated

title: Vegan Eggplant Parmesan
description: Layers of breaded and baked eggplant slices, topped with marinara sauce and vegan cheese, creating a hearty and satisfying dish.
ingredients: 2 large eggplants, sliced into 1/2 inch rounds
steps: Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C).
In a large bowl, combine breadcrumbs, nutritional yeast, Italian seasoning, salt, and black pepper.
Dip each eggplant slice in olive oil, then coat with breadcrumb mixture.
Place the coated eggplant slices on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper. Bake for 25-30 minutes, flipping halfway until golden and crispy.
In a baking dish, spread some marinara sauce on the bottom. Layer baked eggplant slices, marinara sauce, and vegan cheese. Repeat layers until all ingredients are used.
Bake in the preheated oven for another 20 minutes, until the cheese is melted and bubbly.
Let cool for a few minutes before serving.
author: AI-generated
